text:
Rob Moran, is an actor and producer. Moran has appeared in over 60 films. He has produced a few of them.
Personal life.
In 1982, Moran graduated from Emerson College. In 1985, Rob and actress Julie Bryan began dating. They met on a Ford automotive commercial. They were married in 1987. In 1999, their daughter Maiya Dupree was born. In 2004, their second daughter Makayla-Amet was born.
